DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled , phase I study normal healthy volunteer . Study treatment include single dos MNTX placebo . In addition , half active treatment group randomize second , replicate dose MNTX , placebo group receive additional placebo dose .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Weight 55 85 kg 2 . In good health evidence clinically significant chronic medical condition 3 . NonSmokers . 1 . History asthma , allergic skin rash , significant allergy immunologic disorder 2 . Known suspected hypersensitivity opioids opioid antagonists 3 . History suspicion alcohol drug abuse .
